title: 2013 Toyota Tundra with Gibson Swept Side Exhaust
description:
Part # 18603
07-15 Toyota Tundra 4.6L, 4.7L, 5.7L Crew Max,Short Bed 5.5' / Double Cab, Standard Bed 6.5' 2/4wd

Part # 18604
07-15 Toyota Tundra 4.6L, 4.7L, 5.7L Regular Cab, Standard 5.5' Bed 2/4wd

Part # 18605
07-15 Toyota Tundra 4.6L,4.7l, 5.7L Double Cab, Long Bed 2/4wd


Gibson Single Swept Side Exhaust is perfect for improved acceleration, maximum hill climbing, towing and passing power. This is our best performing Exhaust System. Exits behind the rear tire. Quieter in the cab than any other Performance Exhaust. Dyno test results show it makes maximum torque and horsepower at low-end (1800 to 3000 RPM). Horsepower gains average 10-15 and 15-20lb-ft of increase torque. Hassle free, bolt-on installation with professional looking results. No welding required. Backed by a Lifetime Limited Warranty.

– 3-in. aluminized mandrel bent tubing.
– Gibson Muffler features a baffled & chambered design, no internal packing, powerful deep tone.
– 4in. Polished T304 Stainless Rolled Slash- Cut Tip.
– Exits Behind Rear Tire.
– Includes all hardware and factory style hangers for easy bolt on installation.
– Lifetime Limited Warranty
tags: Gibson Performance Exhaust, aftermarket exhaust, cat back, Toyota Tundra, gibson 18603, 18604, 18605
